assertionResults.fullName: ScanOrchestrator - max_issues bug REFACTOR - Maintain functionality should still create all issues when no max_issues limit
assertionResults.title: should still create all issues when no max_issues limit

assertionResults.fullName: ScanOrchestrator - max_issues bug REFACTOR - Maintain functionality should handle edge cases correctly
assertionResults.title: should handle edge cases correctly

assertionResults.fullName: PhaseExecutor - Mitigate Phase Credential Handling should pass rsolvApiKey and useVendedCredentials to processIssues
assertionResults.title: should pass rsolvApiKey and useVendedCredentials to processIssues

assertionResults.fullName: PhaseExecutor - Mitigate Phase Credential Handling should fail gracefully when rsolvApiKey is missing but vended credentials are enabled
assertionResults.title: should fail gracefully when rsolvApiKey is missing but vended credentials are enabled

assertionResults.title: should encrypt files before sending to API
